Package de.ukbonn.mwtek.dashboard.controller

Class DataRetrievalController

java.lang.Object
de.ukbonn.mwtek.dashboard.controller.DataRetrievalController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/createJson") public class DataRetrievalController extends Object
Controller class for the "/createJson" REST endpoint with the main method to create the Json specification for the Corona Dashboard.

    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String>

  • Method Details

    • createJson

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> createJson()
      REST endpoint (/createJson) that handles FHIR server data retrieval as well as processing in Ukb resources, calling dashboard logic and providing Json output.
      Returns:
      String with the json corona dashboard specification or alternatively an error message
